actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the older Americans Act of 1965 to assure that nutrition projects under that Act may include  meals in a congregate setting or home delivered meals, or both, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Older Americans Amendments of 1980 - Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to require each State plan to provide for either congregate setting or home delivered meals based upon a determination of need.

titles.title: A bill to amend the older Americans Act of 1965 to assure that nutrition projects under that Act may include  meals in a congregate setting or home delivered meals, or both, and for other purposes.
